snippet: The Spanish soccer club Real Oviedo, aided by social media, has sold shares in itself to fans who do not expect to profit.
abstract: Debt-ridden Spanish soccer club Real Oviedo, aided by social media, sells shares in itself to fans around the world who do not expect to profit; team has raised about 1.57 million euros, mostly from people who had never been to Spain, let alone seen Real Oviedo play live.
lead_paragraph: The Spanish soccer club Real Oviedo, aided by social media, has sold shares in itself to fans who do not expect to profit.

headline.seo: Last-Ditch Effort to Save Real Oviedo Soccer Club Sweeps Globe
headline.main: Effort to Save Soccer Club Sweeps Globe
headline.print_headline: Soccer Fans Scramble To Make A Save
